name: Today'sQuotefromFamousCharacters
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Have you ever heard a quote? Well now you can! Alexa will tell a quote from your favorite famous characters. Some are good, and some are bad. So what are you waiting for? Add it to your flash briefing so you can hear today's quote!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
